author: The B1M
description:
The surprising Cold War story behind London's BT Tower.

Full story - https://theb1m.com/video/londons-indestructible-nuclear-proof-tower

Additional footage and images courtesy of BT Archives.

00:00 Intro
01:01 Rebuilding London
02:50 Building London’s tallest tower
06:33 A strange new icon
10:04 Soon obsolete

For more by The B1M subscribe now - https://bit.ly/the-b1m
